dialogues.speaker: Mentor
dialogues.text: Welcome to Hong Kong Polytechnic University!

dialogues.speaker: Mentor
dialogues.text: Hong Kong Polytechnic University is a vibrant institution that focuses on applied research and practical learning.

dialogues.speaker: Mentor
dialogues.text: This game is designed to explore university life and discover the available resources.

dialogues.speaker: Mentor
dialogues.text: In game, you can navigate to different locations by simply pressing SpaceKey and complete tasks by interacting with various characters.

dialogues.speaker: Mentor
dialogues.text: You will face various challenges and opportunities throughout your university journey.

dialogues.speaker: Mentor
dialogues.text: You can get the insight as coping strategies when exploring the simulation of campus.

dialogues.speaker: Mentor
dialogues.text: These skills will help you manage stress and balance your academic and personal life.

dialogues.speaker: Mentor
dialogues.text: Are you ready to start your journey and unlock your potential at PolyU? Let's dive in!

dialogues.text: I lost my student ID card in the restaurant. What should I do?
